column5: Is there any site that hosts reduced lodge/outpost rates for lodge owners looking to fill empty weeks? Thanks in advance.

Some of the camp owners that notoriously reduce rates during season are not on the best water (one in particular comes to mind). Don't be surprised after they read your post, that you might be hearing from them, beware.

Try to get in touch with Mike Borger over on canadafishingguide.net. He used to post some but he may have some knowledge of such opportunities. He helped me out on a trip I never thought I could afford for my son and I and is a wealth of knowledge. He is often on this site as well.
Yes, but he's not done it like he did 2-3 years ago. He's too busy fishing to do it like he used to and I don't blame him. Sent from my Pixel 2 XL using Tapatalk

The week of July 7-14 Black Bear Lodge is offering a week of fishing with me as ls and tax included for$375/ person! Check Hidden Bay Lodge website they offer monthly specials, tell Shaggy I said hi.Cedar Point Resort offers some late season rates too! Caught a nice 46 inch musky last September jigging for walleye!
